New Records: Hunter Goodman hit a grand slam with 7 RsSI in a game against the Cubs
Key Match Events: Hunter Goodman's 3-for-4 performance with two home runs, including a heroic late game grand slam that brought the Rockies victory
Pre-Game Insights: Bud Black emphasized the importance of young players making a statement in the last couple of weeks of the season
Post-Match Reflections: Bud Black praised Hunter Goodman's performance, saying he brings calmness and has a good feel for the game, game-calling, and technical aspects of catching
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rockies' catching position for 2025 is murky, with Drew Romo playing less than expected in September and Jacob Stallings thriving this season
Others: Hunter Goodman has a.871 OPS with three home runs and seven doubles over 28 at-bats since his return to the big league club
